headline: Pentair to Release Third Quarter 2025 Earnings and Host Investor Conference Call on October 21
summary: LONDON, October 07, 2025--Pentair plc (NYSE:PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, life’s most essential resource, will report its third quarter 2025 results before the opening of the New York Stock Exchange on Tuesday, October 21, 2025. The company will also hold a conference call with investors at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time that day.
